explains: n. 金枪鱼；金枪鱼肉；<美>金武仙人掌；<美>（可食用的）金武扇仙人掌果实
wordGroup: bluefin tuna 金枪鱼；蓝鳍金枪鱼

sentences.en: Tuna can be grilled, fried or barbecued.
sentences.cn: 金枪鱼可以烤、煎或烧烤着吃。

sentences.en: Thick tuna steaks are eaten rare, like beef.
sentences.cn: 厚厚的金枪鱼片要半熟吃，就像牛肉一样。

sentences.en: A small tuna took the hook on his line.
sentences.cn: 一条小金枪鱼咬住了他线上的鱼钩。
